snippet: A survey found that the loss of managed honeybee colonies from all causes has dropped to 23.2 percent nationwide over the winter that just ended, down from 30.5 percent the year before.
abstract: Survey of beekeepers conducted by Agriculture Department and Bee Informed Partnership finds that loss of managed honeybee colonies from all causes fell to 23.2 percent nationwide over 2013-14 winter, down from 30.5 percent year before.
lead_paragraph: A survey found that the loss of managed honeybee colonies from all causes has dropped to 23.2 percent nationwide over the winter that just ended, down from 30.5 percent the year before.

headline.main: Report Says Fewer Bees Perished Over the Winter, but the Reason Is a Mystery
headline.print_headline: Report Says Fewer Bees Perished Over the Winter, but the Reason Is a Mystery
